mapper.select: select `id` , `name` , `up_dept` upDept, `established_time` establishedTime, `type` , `attribute` , `people_num` peopleNum , `level` , `charge_person` chargePerson , `charge_line_phone` chargeLinePhone , `charge_phone` chargePhone, `charge_email` chargeEmail, `emergency_person` emergencyPerson, `emergency_line_phone` emergencyLinePhone, `emergency_phone` emergencyPhone, `emergency_email` emergencyEmail, `duty_line_phone` dutyLinePhone, `fax`, `address` , `gpsx`, `gpsy`, `area`, `duty` , `accident_type` accidentType, `experience`, `remark` from t_data_rescue_team where 1 =1
